headline: Baxter Disruptions Test Recovery Prospects And Perceived Value Opportunity
summary: Baxter International (NYSE:BAX) is dealing with operational disruptions at its North Cove facility following hurricane related impacts. The company has also placed a shipment hold on its Novum IQ infusion pump after safety concerns and two reported patient deaths. These issues affect both production capacity and a key medical device product line, raising fresh operational and reputational questions. Baxter International enters this period of disruption with its shares at $20.07 and a 1 year...
